item.title: LFP vs Rocco
item.author: Georgina S Morrison,Ashni Malhotra,
item.description: If there is one thing South Kensington doesn’t have a shortage of, it’s Italian restaurants. FELIX decided to put two of the more similarly priced places head to head; the more rustic and traditional Rocca, and the modern, do-it-yourself, Loves Fresh Pasta. First, we headed to Loves Fresh Pasta who …
